attributes.action: Recall parliament and allow a general election.  Reform UK are needed for the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We need a forced election!!
Labour cannot withhold the people of the UK for their needs or wants.  The uk is becoming a disaster with immigration at no end, uk citizens struggling, never ending increases in bills and no voice.  I feel Labour needs to step down to allow Reform  to try and undoubtedly bring the country together.
Labour have been in power for less than 6 months and Kier has already proved his unsupportive behaviour towards to UK citizens.  
He is the downhill of our kingdom.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
